title: Mary & Sevilla talk about 2 Views of Substance
description: Pirsig uses the word "substance" to mean matter. For Pirsig, these are inorganic/organic (biological) patterns of value. But Mary points out that in Classical Greek philosophy (namely Aristotle) substance means something quite different - the unification of the individual example with the greater identity, and that Pirsig's use is confusing.
